    • Uses of Projectile in org.noip.evan1026.graphics

      Methods in org.noip.evan1026.graphics that return Projectile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Projectile Projectile.createProjectileFromCamera(Camera camera)
      Creates a projectile that appears to shoot out of the camera by using the camera's pitch and yaw to determine the velocity of the projectile.
      Projectile[] Rope.getAttachedProjectiles()

      Rope(Projectile proj1, Projectile proj2)
      Initializes the rope, which is simply defined by the two Projectiles that it's attached to.
